variables.input:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| expand ap=labels.alerting_profile
| fieldsadd ap2=replaceString(ap, "\\", "")
| summarize count(), by:{ap2}
| fields ap2

fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.status == "CLOSED"
|summarize problems=countDistinct(display_id), by:{event.category }
|fields event.category

fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| expand et=entity_tags
| fieldsadd et2=replaceString(et, "\\", "")
| summarize count(), by:{et2}
| fields et2

1.content: ### WHAT? Observe IT Issues, event volume, root causes and impacts

4.content: ### How much? Total Events and MTTR

5.title: Events Distribution
5.query:
fetch events
| filter in(event.category, array($category))
| filter in (labels.alerting_profile, array($alerting_profile))
| filter in (entity_tags, array($tags))
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| summarize {problemCount = countDistinct(event.id), by:{event.name}}
| sort problemCount desc

6.title: Average MTTR over time
6.query:
fetch events
| filter in(event.category, array($category))
| filter in (labels.alerting_profile, array($alerting_profile))
| filter in (entity_tags, array($tags))
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" AND isNotNull(resolved_problem_duration)
| dedup display_id 
| summarize avg((resolved_problem_duration)), by:{bin(timestamp, 1m)}, alias: `Avg time to Resolve`

dt.statistics.ui.ForecastAnalyzer.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" AND isNotNull(resolved_problem_duration)
| dedup display_id 
| summarize median((resolved_problem_duration)), by:{bin(timestamp, 1m)}, alias: `Median Minutes to Resolve`

7.title: Median Problem Resolution Time in Minutes
7.query:
fetch events
| filter in(event.category, array($category))
| filter in (labels.alerting_profile, array($alerting_profile))
| filter in (entity_tags, array($tags))
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| dedup display_id
| summarize median(resolved_problem_duration), alias:`50% of events has been resolved in`

categoryAxis: 50% of events has been resolved in
categoricalBarChartSettings.categoryAxisLabel: 50% of events has been resolved in
valueAxis: 50% of events has been resolved in
categoricalBarChartSettings.valueAxisLabel: 50% of events has been resolved in

singleValue.label: 50% of events has been resolved in
singleValue.recordField: 50% of events has been resolved in

dataMappings.valueAxis: 50% of events has been resolved in

label.label: 50% of events has been resolved in

unitsOverrides.identifier: 50% of events has been resolved in

dataMapping.value: 50% of events has been resolved in

11.content: ### WHERE do I need to improve?

12.title: Most Common Slowdown Root Causes
12.query:
fetch events
| filter in(event.category, array($category))
| filter in (labels.alerting_profile, array($alerting_profile))
| filter in (entity_tags, array($tags))
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and (event.category == "SLOWDOWN") 
| filterOut isNull(root_cause_entity_id)
|dedup display_id
| summarize count=count(), by:{ root_cause_entity_name}
| sort count desc
| fields Name=root_cause_entity_name, Count=count

18.title: Events count
18.query:
fetch events
| filter in(event.category, array($category))
| filter in (labels.alerting_profile, array($alerting_profile))
| filter in (entity_tags, array($tags))
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| summarize {problemCount = countDistinct(event.id), by:{event.name}}
| fields {event.name, alias:`Event Name`}, {problemCount, alias:`Count`}
| sort `Count` desc

19.query:
fetch events
| filter in(event.category, array($category))
| filter in (labels.alerting_profile, array($alerting_profile))
| filter in (entity_tags, array($tags))
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| dedup display_id
| summarize avg(resolved_problem_duration), alias:`Average MTTR`

20.title: AVG MTTR by Event type
20.query:
fetch events
| filter in(event.category, array($category))
| filter in (labels.alerting_profile, array($alerting_profile))
| filter in (entity_tags, array($tags))
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" AND isNotNull(resolved_problem_duration)
| dedup display_id 
| summarize avg((resolved_problem_duration)), by:{event.name}, alias:`ATTR`
| sort ATTR desc

25.title: Most Common Resource Contention Root Causes
25.query:
fetch events
| filter in(event.category, array($category))
| filter in (labels.alerting_profile, array($alerting_profile))
| filter in (entity_tags, array($tags))
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and (event.category == "RESOURCE_CONTENTION")
| filterOUT isNull(root_cause_entity_id)
|dedup display_id
| summarize count=count(), by:{ root_cause_entity_name}
| sort count desc
| fields Name=root_cause_entity_name, Count=count

27.title: Most Common Availability Root Causes
27.query:
fetch events
| filter in(event.category, array($category))
| filter in (labels.alerting_profile, array($alerting_profile))
| filter in (entity_tags, array($tags))
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and (event.category == "AVAILABILITY")
| filterOUT isNull(root_cause_entity_id)
|dedup display_id
| summarize count=count(), by:{root_cause_entity_name}
| sort count desc
| fields Name=root_cause_entity_name, Count=count

38.title: Top 10 root cause entities
38.query:
fetch events
| filter in(event.category, array($category))
| filter in (labels.alerting_profile, array($alerting_profile))
| filter in (entity_tags, array($tags))
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and isNotNull(root_cause_entity_name)
| expand root_cause_entity_name
| summarize problemCount=countDistinct(event.id), by: {root_cause_entity_name}
| sort problemCount desc
| fields Name=root_cause_entity_name, Count=problemCount
| limit 10

39.title: Affected entities types
39.query:
fetch events
| filter in(event.category, array($category))
| filter in (labels.alerting_profile, array($alerting_profile))
| filter in (entity_tags, array($tags))
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand entityType = affected_entity_types
| summarize problemCount=countDistinct(event.id), by: {entityType}
| sort problemCount desc
| fields entityType, Count=problemCount

41.title: MTTR Hours (Forecast)
41.query:
fetch events, from:now()-90d
| filter in(event.category, array($category))
| filter in (labels.alerting_profile, array($alerting_profile))
| filter in (entity_tags, array($tags))
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"AND isNotNull(resolved_problem_duration)
| dedup display_id 
| makeTimeseries `AVG Hours to Resolve`=avg(resolved_problem_duration/60000000000/60)

42.title: Events duration distribution

43.title: Events on root cause entities
43.query:
fetch events
| filter in(event.category, array($category))
| filter in (labels.alerting_profile, array($alerting_profile))
| filter in (entity_tags, array($tags))
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and isNotNull(root_cause_entity_name)
| expand root_cause_entity_name
| summarize problemCount=countDistinct(event.id), by: {root_cause_entity_name}
| sort problemCount desc
| fields Name=root_cause_entity_name, Count=problemCount

44.title: Events (Forecast)
44.query:
fetch events, from:now()-90d
| filter in(event.category, array($category))
| filter in (labels.alerting_profile, array($alerting_profile))
| filter in (entity_tags, array($tags))
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"AND isNotNull(resolved_problem_duration)
| dedup display_id 
| makeTimeseries count(), time: timestamp

45.title: cumulated MTTR hours (Forecast)
45.query:
fetch events, from:now()-90d
| filter in(event.category, array($category))
| filter in (labels.alerting_profile, array($alerting_profile))
| filter in (entity_tags, array($tags))
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"AND isNotNull(resolved_problem_duration)
| dedup display_id 
| makeTimeseries `AVG Hours to Resolve`=(sum(resolved_problem_duration/60000000000/60))

mo_azure","at-host-group:eks","at-host-group:et-large","at-host-group:google_cloud","at-host-group:vmware","criticality:Gold","dt.owner:Avengers","dt.owner:demoability-easytrade","dt.owner:demoability-easytravel","dt.owner:easytrave-infra-team","dt.owner:vmware-infra-team","dt_owner_team:team-demoability","et_demo","k8s-namespace:astroshop","k8s-namespace:easytrade","k8s-namespace:easytrade-live-debugger","k8s-namespace:ingress-nginx","k8s-namespace:online-boutique","k8s-namespace:prod","k8s-namespace:tomcat-connection-pools-demo","otel-ingest","oteldemo-ingest","owner:Avengers","slo_authenticationservice","slo_bookingservice","slo_checkdestinationservice","slo_easytravelservice","slo_easytravelwebserver:9079","slo_journeyservice","usecase:booking"))
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"AND isNotNull(resolved_problem_duration)
| dedup display_id 
| makeTimeseries `AVG Hours to Resolve`=(sum(resolved_problem_duration/60000000000/60))

46.query:
fetch events, from:now()-30d
| filter in(event.category, array($category))
| filter in (labels.alerting_profile, array($alerting_profile))
| filter in (entity_tags, array($tags))
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" AND isNotNull(resolved_problem_duration)
| dedup display_id
| summarize sum(resolved_problem_duration), alias:`ATTR`

47.title: Most Common Error Root Causes
47.query:
fetch events
| filter in(event.category, array($category))
| filter in (labels.alerting_profile, array($alerting_profile))
| filter in (entity_tags, array($tags))
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and (event.category == "ERROR") 
| filterOut isNull(root_cause_entity_id)
|dedup display_id
| summarize count=count(), by:{ root_cause_entity_name}
| sort count desc
| fields Name=root_cause_entity_name, Count=count

50.title: Average MTTR / DAY
50.query:
fetch events, from:now()-12M
| filter in(event.category, array($category))
| filter in (labels.alerting_profile, array($alerting_profile))
| filter in (entity_tags, array($tags))
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"AND isNotNull(resolved_problem_duration)
| dedup display_id 

| fieldsAdd date = formatTimestamp(timestamp, format:"YYYY/MM")
| summarize `AVG Minutes to Resolve`=avg(resolved_problem_duration), by:date
| sort date

dt.statistics.ui.ForecastAnalyzer.query:
fetch events, from:now()-12M
| filter in(event.category, array("AVAILABILITY","CUSTOM_ALERT","ERROR","RESOURCE_CONTENTION","SLOWDOWN"))
| filter in (labels.alerting_profile, array("Default","ServiceNow Default Problem Notification Profile","cpu_saturation_alerting","deployment_change_autoremediation","process_crash_autoremediation"))
| filter in (entity_tags, array("AppSec:.NET","AppSec:Java","Azure:App Service","Azure:VM","BM via Monaco","Configured via Monaco","ET Angular","EasyTravel","HTTP via oshop","k8s-namespace:easytrade","k8s-namespace:easytrade-live-debugger","k8s-namespace:ingress-nginx","k8s-namespace:online-boutique","k8s-namespace:prod","k8s-namespace:tomcat-connection-pools-demo","otel-ingest","oteldemo-ingest","owner:Avengers","slo_authenticationservice","slo_bookingservice","slo_checkdestinationservice","slo_easytravelservice","slo_easytravelwebserver:9079","slo_journeyservice","usecase:booking"))

62.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter in(event.category, array($category))
| filter in (labels.alerting_profile, array($alerting_profile))
| filter in (entity_tags, array($tags))
| filter isnotnull(resolved_problem_duration)
| dedup display_id
| fieldsadd link = concat("[", display_id, "](https://", $tenant, ".apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.davis.problems/problem/", event.id, ")")
| fields  id = link, event = event.name, `Time to resolve` = resolved_problem_duration
| sort `Time to resolve` desc
| limit 20

66.title: Total Cumulated time for Top 10 longest events
66.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter in(event.category, array($category))
| filter in (labels.alerting_profile, array($alerting_profile))
| filter in (entity_tags, array($tags))
| filter isnotnull(resolved_problem_duration)
| dedup display_id
| fields event = event.name, `Time to resolve` = resolved_problem_duration
| sort `Time to resolve` desc
| limit 10
| summarize sum(`Time to resolve`)

68.content: ### 📈 WHAT IF? Trends (90 days) and Predicton
